text:
evaluating
Decide what to evaluate
Usually, during the planning stage, objectives, operational
targets, strategies and activities are already identified with
corresponding indicators.  If these were not identified
beforehand, it is worthwhile doing so before proceeding
with evaluation.
Based on the programme objectives, operational targets or
strategies, select critical points for evaluation.
Example:
Operational target:
To train 50%  of midwives on management of
obstetrical complications by the
